amendment.description: To prevent the creation of duplicative and overlapping Federal programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 1738 proposed by Senator Coburn.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1738, under the order of 3/7/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 46. Record Vote Number: 31.
